catalogue_description: Hebrew and Judaica Manuscripts at the Bodleian Libraries, Oxford University
title: Hebrew translation of Aristotle's works
author: Alguadez, Meir ben Solomon
description: Contents: Luaḥ me-Sefer ha-midot shel Arisṭo (ff. 1r-28r). Meir ben Solomon Alguadez, Introduction to Aristotle's Ethics (ff. 29r-33v).Meir ben Solomon Alguadez's Hebrew translation of Aristotle's Ethics: Sefer ha-midot (ff. 36r-129r).
